front.title: IP link and multicast over InfiniBand networks

abstract.t: This document specifies a method for setting up IP subnets andmulticast services over InfiniBand(TM) networks. Discussions in thisdocument are applicable to both IPv4 and IPv6, unless explicitlyspecified. A separate document will cover unicast and encapsulationof IP datagrams over InfiniBand networks.
